author: Kate Morris and Sally Brown
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Line a baking tray with greaseproof paper.  Roll the dough out on a floured worked surface to a 3mm/⅛in thickness. Spread the tomato puree all ove the pastry. Sprinkle over the cheddar and basil. Roll the pastry up tightly, then cut it into 12 slices. Place the slices, cut-side up onto the baking tray and bake for 12-15 minutes or until golden-brown.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz ready-made puff pastry,  4 tsp tomato puree,  30g/1oz cheddar, grated,  4 fresh basil leaves, shredded
